attributes.action: Allow Non-Catholic Children To Travel On Same School Bus As Catholics FLINTSHIRE
attributes.additional_details:
Allow ALL children travelling to and from Catholic High Schools in Flintshire on the same bus regardless of their religion.
Flintshire County Council are no longer allowing Catholic and Non-Catholic children on the school bus travelling to and from St Richard Gwyn High School, Flint.
This petition is to argue that ALL pupils of the school should be entitled to take the school bus whether they are Catholic or not.
Fair bus travel for every pupil regardless of the church they were baptised in.
We are not asking for a free bus, just a seat for a concessionary fare to let our children get to and from school safely.
